message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95.
I'm getting close to your price, Bob. I'll try to sweeten the deal. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your efforts to sweeten the deal, but I'm still a bit away from my target. How about $98?
I understand you're getting close to your target, Bob. I'll try to meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $102.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit away from my target. How about $97?
I'm getting close to the end of my negotiation rope, Bob. I'll try one more time. I'll sell the product to you for $99.
I appreciate your last offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. This is my final offer.
